title: ScreenFlow - 4.5 Dec 2013
description:
Name: ScreenFlow
Version: - 4.5

Mac Platform: Intel
Includes: K

OS version: 10.7.3 or higher

Link for more information: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/screenflow-4/id573279886



Get your video on the web with Telestream ScreenFlow award-winning screen recording and video editing software. With ScreenFlow you can record the contents of your entire computer screen while also capturing your video camera, microphone and (with optional components) your computer audio. The easy-to-use editing interface lets you creatively edit your video; add additional images, text, or music; and add transitions for a truly professional-looking video. The finished result is an MPEG-4 or QuickTime movie, ready for publishing to your Web site, blog or directly to YouTube or Vimeo.

Use ScreenFlow to create high-quality software demos, tutorials, app demos, training, presentations and more!

Highest quality screen recording

Retina display? No problem. Our efficient algorithm enables full-screen, 2880 x 1800-resolution screen capture with brilliant detail, while keeping file sizes low.

Powerful video editing

Easily add images, text, audio, video transitions and more to create professional-looking videos. Nested clips, closed captioning, chroma key, mouse callouts, annotations, video and audio filters, and freehand callouts are just a few of the touches that make ScreenFlow editing easy and powerful.

Whats new:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Support for OS X 10.9 Mavericks
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Expanded Publishing support Ã¢â‚¬â€œ now includes options to publish to Google Drive, Dropbox and Facebook
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Improved Upload Manager now allows for asynchronous uploads in the background to free up timeline
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢New Wipe Transition Pack available for purchase ($19.99)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Improved ability to manage transitions and mark ones as favorites
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added search field to Video & Audio filter popover
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Implemented double-clicking sending source to timeline when in the media library list mode
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added 60 fps option to the Pro-Res export and 25 fps to H.264 options to standardize
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added 'Select All' when the media library is in thumbnail mode
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added Shift as a modifier for multiple selection in the canvas
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Implemented 'Deselect All' for the Media Library
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed bug where edits were getting lost on 10.9
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed not being able to adjust points on a filter after an action
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Extra "space" graphic appears when shift-selecting multiple spaces at a time
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed transition color well to be correctly selectable
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Implemented frame-rate control in the 'Customize' window of the ProRes preset
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed subtitles not showing up in exported movie when a range selection was used
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed video view not showing correct timeline tabs when the document is restored
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed 'Depth of Field' video filter center point buttons cut off
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Prevented the ScreenFlow document from being able to close when a publish is in progress
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Faded down the nested icon when the scrubber is over it
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Captions drawn into the preview now account for any scrolling
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed being able to create top layers when dragging media up the timeline
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed issue where nesting clips with transitions between them removed the transition
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed issue where splitting a nested clip containing child transitions removed them
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Flipped the main audio meters to have left on the top, right on the bottom
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed the helper shutting down even when terminate is cancelled by an in-progress export
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢When showing the captions in 'Preview' mode, they will no longer have garbage in the background
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Reset the default transition if it's been removed from the system
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Remember the position of the category in the transition inspector
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed issue where pasting a high resolution clip into a lower resolution canvas won't display keystrokes bar correctly
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed bug where the content could be tinted blue
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed Freeze frame not added to start or end of a clip when editing Nested clips
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed text to speech clips not showing up
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added workaround to stop ScreenFlow crashing if quitting while exporting
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed audio wave form not drawn correctly when one region of a clip is muted
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed Core Image transitions having a shift in color
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed color shift with video actions
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed 10.9 not showing the circular slider correctly
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed Transition Inspector tabs displaying incorrectly
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Audio only MPEG-4 exports will now show a progress bar
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed color correction tools not working in 10.9
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed issue where adding video action removes Audio Filter effect

NB:

*please note: there are a few differences in this Mac App Store version and the version we sell on our Telestream store. Click this link to read about these differences: www.telestream.net/telestream-support/screen-flow/faq.htm#1d
